name: Aved Luun
Lore: 'Shaman of her Jawa tribe. Mate of Kalit. Suspects betrayal from her mate''s rival, Wittin.',
Text: 'Deploys only on Tatooine. During your control phase, may search Reserve Deck, take one Utinni! or Jawa into hand and reshuffle. If you have 3 or more Jawas on table, may play Utinni! to cancel a Force drain at a Tatooine site or to cancel Control.',
